title: RISC OS Select 5i2  (RISC OS 6.06 with upgrade to 6.16) full ins
description:
+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Supplied......:  Acorn Antiques    Release name..:  SELECT_5i2.rar |
        |   Packaged......:  filth             Release type..:  Util           |
        |   Protection....:  none              Language......:  English        |
        |   Crack/SN......:  n/a               Size..........:  113 MB         |
        |   Format........:  ISO inside RAR    OS............:  RISC OS        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   MD5 checksum.................: 5d469a2410e6642b3b7ec84620e91287    |
        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   RISC OS 6 Select 5i2 is a more- up-to-date version of RISC OS that |
        |   can be softloaded over earlier copies (RISC OS 4.02 and above).    |
        |   Some caveats may apply (see below, and the readme files on the CD. |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Users who already have Select 4i2 (RISC OS 6.06) or Select 4i4     |
        |   (RISC OS 6.10) installed should use the contents of the            |
        |   'UpgradeRO6' directory to upgrade to Select 5i1. Users running     |
        |   these versions of RISC OS 6 MUST NOT use the full RISC OS Six      |
        |   installer supplied in the 'NewUsers' directory. To install and     |
        |   use the upgrade you MUST already have Select 5i1 (RISC OS 6.14)    |
        |   installed and running on your computer (included in this release). |
        |   Do not attempt to use this ROM if you are using any other version  |
        |   of RISC OS.                                                        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Note that RISC OS 6 needs to be installed to a drive that has long |
        |   filename support enabled.                                          |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Compatibility                                                      |
        |   -------------                                                      |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Users who already have Select 4i2 (RISC OS 6.06) or Select 4i4     |
        |   (RISC OS 6.10) installed should use the contents of the            |
        |   'UpgradeRO6' directory to upgrade to Select 5i1. Users running     |
        |   these versions of RISC OS 6 MUST NOT use the full RISC OS Six      |
        |   installer supplied in the 'NewUsers' directory. To install and use |
        |   this upgrade you MUST already have Select 5i1 (RISC OS 6.14)       |
        |   installed and running on your computer. DO NOT attempt to use this |
        |   ROM if you are using any other version of RISC OS.                 |
        |                                                                      |
        |   This release of Select is suitable for the following machines:     |
        |                                                                      |
        |       A7000/A7000+                                                   |
        |       RiscPC/Turbo/Kinetic/StrongArm RiscPC                          |
        |       MicroDigital Alpha                                             |
        |                                                                      |
        |   In addition, this release is also suitable for use on the          |
        |   following VirtualAcorn products:                                   |
        |                                                                      |
        |       VirtualRPC-SE/SA/Adjust/AdjustSA                               |
        |                                                                      |
        |   This release of Select is NOT suitable for the following machines. |
        |   Attempts to install Select5i1 on these machines may cause them to  |
        |   fail to boot correctly.                                            |
        |                                                                      |
        |       MicroDigital Omega/Mico                                        |
        |       RiscStation                                                    |
        |       Iyonix                                                         |
        |       A9 Home                                                        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Upgrade from earlier versions of RISC OS                           |
        |   ----------------------------------------                           |
        |                                                                      |
        |   This release is ONLY suitable for the upgrade of an existing       |
        |   stand-alone ROM based RISC OS 4 or RISC OS Adjust (4.39) install.  |
        |   Please ensure that you have booted from the hard disk that is to   |
        |   be upgraded and not, for example, from another machine via a       |
        |   network. Do not attempt to install RISC OS 6 on a machine running  |
        |   a 'soft loaded' version of RISC OS 4.02.                           |
        |                                                                      |
        +----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Visit our profile for more, including some vary rare releases!     |
        |                                                                      |
        |               <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/user/antiques" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/user/antiques</a>                 |
        |                                                                      |
        |  [tags: risc, risc os, acorn, acorn user, riscos, magazine, cover]   |
        |                                                                      |

        |   to ensure that these CDs and the files on them are never lost.     |
        |   Do your part to help, but please do support legitimate developers! |
        |                                                                      |
